      • getResolutionValue

        public int getResolutionValue(boolean pow)
        Gets the resolution value
        Parameters:
        pow - resolution power
        Returns:
        value
        if pow is true,
        256:8bit
        1024:10bit
        4096:12bit
        65536:16bit
        ..:.....
        if pow is false,
        8:8bit
        10:10bit
        12:12bit
        16:16bit
        ..:.....

      • getVoltageValue

        public double getVoltageValue(int channelID)
                       throws IOException
        Turn on conversion and gets the voltage value
        Parameters:
        channelID - the channel id, range:0-15
        Returns:
        voltage value from reference voltage and max raw value
        Throws:
        IOException - If a TiADC error occurs

      • open

        Open the TiADC port by port id and the channel list, and return the object
        Parameters:

        channelIDs - channel id use, id range:0-15
        Returns:
        TiADC object
        Throws:
        IOException - If a TiADC error occurs

        Set the reference voltage value and voltage division
